Articles.Content:
I've never seen this, a mod that would:

-List all the planted flags on a body

-Show the title and text

-Show the Lat/Long

-Have a button to create a custom waypoint at the flag's location

At least I know of now way to do those things, but I hardly know everything, so maybe someone will tell me how to do all these things or point me to a mod. But if not, that would be a spiffy mod and probably pretty quick to do. In the first three cases you're just displaying what should be member variables of existing objects, and I would guess the custom waypoint creation call is pretty well known by now.

For #1, KER and Haystack Continued I believe can do that.  (Depending on situation.)  I'm pretty sure KER can do #3, and I've never needed #4, as anything that I've wanted to use a waypoint for will also let you use your current target.
